definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through

sentences.english: Huxley was an exponent of Darwin's theory of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 赫胥黎是达尔文进化论的鼓吹者。

sentences.english: Advocacy of law-breaking heightens it still further.
sentences.chinese: 鼓吹违法行为更有助于提升这种可能性。

sentences.english: The research on folk wind and percussion music is one of the main concerns in the research on folk music.
sentences.chinese: 民间鼓吹乐研究是地方乐种研究的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: Where is the democracy and liberalism they preach to the world?
sentences.chinese: 他们向世界鼓吹的民主和自由在哪里呢？

sentences.english: She preached economy as the best means of solving the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 她大力鼓吹节约是解决危机的关键。

sentences.english: It would make space for civic organizations and democratic activists.
sentences.chinese: 这个倡议将为民间组织和民主鼓吹者提供活动空间。

sentences.english: Iive never read a far more stirring story.
sentences.chinese: 我平素没读过比这更令人鼓吹的故事。

sentences.english: The paper agitated for better housing.
sentences.chinese: 这家报纸鼓吹要改善住房条件。

sentences.english: Mr Wen himself is no touter of a China model.
sentences.chinese: 温先生本人并非中国模式的鼓吹者。

sentences.english: A reality check, do we practice what we preach ?
sentences.chinese: 事实检验，我们实践了我们所鼓吹的吗？

sentences.english: These were reforms for which they were prepared to agitate.
sentences.chinese: 那些就是他们准备鼓吹的改革。

sentences.english: He is beginning to talk his idea up among us.
sentences.chinese: 他开始在我们中间鼓吹他的观点。

sentences.english: The owner of the bookstore doesn't have to carry the art book of nudes or the pro-Nazi thesis.
sentences.chinese: 书店店主并不非要进裸体艺术图书和鼓吹纳粹的论文。

sentences.english: The overseas anti-China forces advocate "Tibet independence".
sentences.chinese: 国外反华势力鼓吹“中藏独立”。

sentences.english: Myriad pines days advocate, spent months Kam curtain round cage.
sentences.chinese: 万壑松风天鼓吹，四围花月锦帘栊。

sentences.english: The second part is the study of Hengchui ballads.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是“鼓吹曲辞”的音乐学研究。

definition: to proclaim/to make public or well known
military banner/flag signal/(fig.) banner (i.e. false pretenses)
to criticize harshly/to denounce/to attack viciously

nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism
